title: Flipped Learning-Based Mathematics Project Design and Analysis of Learning Behavior Changes in K-12 Education

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematics curriculum fundamentals and project-based learning experience
context.additional_context: Designing mathematics education projects in a flipped learning environment using digital devices, and analyzing learner behavioral changes

learning_goals: Learners apply theoretical frameworks for mathematics project design with 80% or higher accuracy in a flipped learning environment
Learners secure at least three hours of self-directed learning time per week using digital tools and record learning behavior changes
Learners submit team-based mathematics education project outcomes with 90% or higher completion rates through PBL-based assessment systems

resources: Online Lecture Production Tools (Video Editing Software)
Data Analysis Tools (Learning Behavior Tracking Apps)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
